entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 4 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 60%
